alert.note: Alert for Montour; Northumberland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 9:19PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHUMBERLAND AND MONTOUR COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 919 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Selinsgrove, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Sunbury, Milton, Danville, Northumberland, Elysburg, Fairview-Ferndale, Riverside, Trevorton, Shamokin Dam, Hummels Wharf, Montandon, Mechanicsville, Klingerstown, Leck Kill, Urban, Mooresburg, Stonington, Rebuck, Exchange and Edgewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central, south central and north central Pennsylvania.
